ygData.subject: H3 ExtractorHTML doesn't seem to extract relative path URLs
ygData.msgSnippet: I tried to crawl a few sites with the default setting supplied in the package, H3 (version 3.1.0 beta) doesn t seem to be able to extract link from relative

I tried to crawl a few sites with the default setting supplied in the
packa=
ge, H3 (version 3.1.0 beta) doesn't seem to be able to extract link
from re=
lative links. for example if link in a HTML content look like:

These links=
 are not restricted by robots.txt<a href=3D"/test/index.jsp" />
And it can'=
t even pick up these links like:<a href=3D"/example/" />
Am I doing somethi=
ng wrong?  Any help would be very appreciated. Thanks
in advance.
